nodes.text: The Tellonites were a group that were represented in the Senate of the Galactic Republic. The Sith Lord Darth Sidious, publicly Senator Palpatine of Naboo, oversaw the proposal of a taxation bill in the Senate, which he intended to fail in order to witness the Tellonites' reaction. The Sith Lord's plan succeeded, and Sidious managed to learn what the Tellonites were willing to lose in the Senate.
